translated: Théodore de Banville is a French poet and playwright, born March 14, 1823 in Moulins (Allier) and died March 13, 1891 (68 years) in Paris.
original: Théodore de Banville est un poète et dramaturge français, né le 14 mars 1823 à Moulins (Allier) et mort le 13 mars 1891 (à 68 ans) à Paris.
